sentences.en: A raise? When your work is so slipshod?
sentences.cn: 提升? 当你工作这么马马虎虎的时候?

sentences.en: Colonel Cathcart was a slick, successful , slipshod, unhappy man of thirty - six .
sentences.cn: 卡思卡特上校为人机灵圆滑, 事业一帆风顺, 年纪已 三十六 岁,他不修边幅, 性格抑郁愁闷.

sentences.en: Dad was not in favor of spending time on books made a rough and slipshod way.
sentences.cn: 爸爸绝对不赞成花功夫看那些粗编滥造、滥画的东西.

sentences.en: Don't do your work in a slipshod manner . You should be conscientious and have a sense of responsibility.
sentences.cn: 对工作不能随随便便, 要认真负责.

sentences.en: I was angry at his slipshod work.
sentences.cn: 我为他工作粗心而生气.

sentences.en: Like many women, I've felt guilty about my slipshod breast exams for years.
sentences.cn: 与许多妇女一样, 很多年来我为对自己的胸部检查漫不经心而感到内疚.

sentences.en: Slipshod work will never pass muster.
sentences.cn: 草率的工作绝对经不起检查.

sentences.en: Small firms with slipshod standards are being replaced by bigger, better ones. Where people are creating companies, they are doing so out of choice, not economic necessity.
sentences.cn: 在某些层面上看这是一个好消息，那些不认真奉行标准的小公司正在被更大，更好的公司取代，在哪里创办公司将基于个人的选择而不再是经济的需要。

sentences.en: Some TV plays are made in a rough and slipshod way.
Such lax and slipshod ways are no longer acceptable.
sentences.cn: 如此松懈、马虎的态度再也无法容忍了.

sentences.en: The hotel had always been run in a slipshod way.
sentences.cn: 该酒店的管理一向马虎。

sentences.en: They were raked over the coals for burning out slipshod work.
sentences.cn: 他们因做事马虎而受到责骂.

sentences.en: They would muddle on in the old slipshod way of trusting to chance.
sentences.cn: 他们还像从前那样,听天由命,得过且过.

sentences.en: You're too slipshod about your presentation.

words.tran_cn: 潦草的；穿著不整洁的；穿著踏跟鞋的

trans.tran_en: done too quickly and carelessly – used to show disapproval
